word:
MS. 141 '03 (Copied Aug '03):-- 


     Medical Missionary work is yet in its infancy. The meaning of genuine medical missionary work is known by but few. Why?--Because God's money has been misapplied. Practical evangelistic work is being done (should be: "is not being done") in many places, but the workers who go (should be: "who should go forth") forth as did the disciples are collected in one place, as they have been in the past, notwithstanding God's warning that this should not be.
